Class TransferFunctionType

Object
CodeList<TransferFunctionType>
TransferFunctionType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Transfer­Function­Type>
@UML(identifier="MI_TransferFunctionTypeCode", specification=ISO_19115_2) public final class TransferFunctionType extends CodeList<TransferFunctionType>
Transform function to be used when scaling a physical value for a given element.
Since:
2.3
See Also:

      public static TransferFunctionType valueOf(String code)
